葼字的基本解释

葼
zōng
细树枝：“弱葼系实。”
古书上说的一种草：“蓼蕺葼荠。”

葼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
(1)树木的细枝。
(2)草名。

葼字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　葼； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1047第03
【唐韻】子紅切【集韻】【韻會】祖叢切，?音騣。【博雅】小也。【說文】木細枝也。【揚子·方言】木細枝謂之杪，靑、齊、兗、冀閒謂之葼。故傳曰：慈母之怒子也，雖折葼笞之，其惠存焉。　又草名。【謝靈運·山居賦】蓼蕺葼薺。【謝朓詩】弱葼旣蔥翠，輕莎方靃靡。　又染草。【漢宮儀】葼園供染綠紋綬。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】木細枝謂之杪靑，齊燕冀閒謂之葼，故傳曰，慈母之怒子也，猶折葼笞之，其惠存焉。〕　謹照原文燕改兗。猶改雖。
葼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
葼字的起名意思

暂无。

Fen
Basic explanation of words
Fen
zōng
Twigs: "Weak vines are solid."
A kind of grass said in ancient books: "Polygonum vulgare."
Fen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
(1) Twigs of trees.
(2) Cursive name.
Fen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　葼; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1047 03
[Tang Yun] Zihong cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ancestral Cong cut,? Yin Xie. [Bo Ya] Xiao Ye. [Said the text] Wood twigs are also. [Yangtze Dialect] Wooden twigs are called Zhili, and Qian, Qi, Yan, and Jixian are called Feng. Therefore, it is said that the anger of a loving mother is also an angry son, although it is folded, his benefit is Cunyan.　Also cursive name. 【Xie Lingyun·Shanju Fu】Polygonum vulgare. [Xie Tiao's poems] Weak and verdant, Qingsha Fang Tianmi.　 Dyed the grass again. [Han Gong Yi] The garden is for dyeing green cogwheels. Textual research: [[Yangtze Dialect] The wooden twigs are called "Liaoqian" and Qi Yanjixian is called "Liaoqian". Therefore, it is said that the anger of a kind mother is also the anger of the son. 〕 　 I would like to change Yan Yan according to the original text. Still change though.
Fen

Name meaning
Nothing.
zōng
сущ.
1) диал. тонкие ветки, прутья, лоза; розга
折葼笞 пороть, ломая розги
2) * красильная трава, трава-краситель
